abstract: On Wednesday, Apple is expected to unveil new iPods and a new version of iTunes in a bid to reinvigorate slowing sales of the portable media players.
snippet: On Wednesday, Apple is expected to unveil new iPods and a new version of iTunes in a bid to reinvigorate slowing sales of the portable media players.
lead_paragraph: The Apple event Wednesday in San Francisco, which begins at 1 p.m. East Coast time, is all about the music.
